name: unadjudicated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a crime or legal case is unadjudicated, a judge has not made a formal decision about it: The court left the claim unadjudicated. Many of the complaints that were brought before the panel went unadjudicated. Related word
adjudicate
More examplesFewer examplesThe court also considered the defendant's previous crimes and some unadjudicated offences.Evidence of unadjudicated juvenile crimes may be used in this court.There were several witnesses to this unadjudicated act, but they refused to testify.Evidence of unadjudicated conduct will not be excluded from the court.
